pr_title: Add micrometer to issue auto-labelling configuration

timeline.message: Add micrometer to issue auto-labelling configuration

timeline.author: machi1990
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,6 +79,10 @@
   title: "(?i).*metrics.*"
   description: "(?i).*metrics.*"
   notify: [jmartisk]
+- labels: [area/metrics]
+  title: "(?i).*micrometer.*"
+  description: "(?i).*micrometer.*"
+  notify: [ebullient]

replies.bodyText: Given that Micrometer is mostly done @ebullient, I think that she can ping Jan when needed
replies.author: geoand
